eCommerce: MGD Mall is an e-commerce company that offers a wide range of products and services through our online shopping platform.
policyDes: Thank you for choosing to use our shopping website. Here are the terms and conditions you should be aware of when shopping.
conditionDes: By using our website, you are deemed to agree to be bound by these terms and our policy.
accountFir: In order to purchase products on our website, you need to register an account. You can also register with a phone number, a Gmail account, or Facebook. When registering an account, you must fill in some personal information. It is your responsibility to ensure that the information entered is correct.
accountSec: A password is entered when registering on the website. You alone are responsible for this secret.Someone knows about your account. If you suspect fraud, you may directly contact our MGD Mall customer service team to cancel your consent.
intellectualDes: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of our company or our suppliers and is protected by Myanmar copyright laws. You may not use MGD Mall's trademarks or other trademarks without permission.
pricingDes: We make every effort to ensure that our product descriptions and prices are accurate and up-to-date. However, we cannot guarantee that all information on our website is error-free. We reserve the right to correct any errors or inaccuracies and to change or update information at any time without prior notice.
suspend: Right to suspend or cancel your account
suspendFir: Violation of the following terms may result in immediate suspension or cancellation of your account on the Website.
suspendSec: We have any reason to believe that you are using the Website for fraudulent purposes.
suspendThd: By using the Website, you are breaking any laws or regulations.
shippingDes: We accept online payments and cash on delivery. Products are delivered to the address provided by the customer during checkout. Customers are responsible for providing accurate shipping information. We are not responsible for any delays or problems during shipping.
refundsDes: We offer a 7-day return policy on most products. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it for a refund or exchange. The product must be in its original condition and packaging. Buyers are responsible for return shipping charges if the product is voluntarily returned by the buyer and not due to a faulty product.
reserveDes: We reserve the right to change or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. By continuing to use the website, you are deemed to have accepted the new terms and conditions.
visiondes: To be the leading eco-friendly family online shopping.
missiondes: To create a fun, engaging and eco-friendly online shopping experience for families and children.
mgdDes: Myanmar Golden Dragon International Mall Co., Ltd is our name, and we are located in the HlaingTharYar Industrial zone. It was founded in 2020 and now employs 34 people.MGD Mall is an e-commerce company that offers a wide range of products and services through our online shopping platform.We are dedicated to providing our customers with a convenient and hassle-free shopping experience, where they can easily browse, compare, and purchase their favorite products from the comfort of their own home.
ischose: We understand that you have many options when it comes to shopping online, and we are grateful that you have chosen us.
firstChose: Our team is dedicated to providing you with the best possible online shopping experience. We strive to make sure that our website is easy to use, our products are of the highest quality, and our prices are competitive.
secChose: We are constantly adding new products to our website, so please check back often to see what's new. And if you have any questions or concerns, our customer service team is always here to help. You can reach us by phone, email.
thrChose: We aim to create a seamless shopping experience for you by continuously improving our website's features and functionality. Our website is designed to be easy to use and navigate, and we are always looking for ways to make it even better.
comunicate: We are committed to making sure that your shopping experience with us is enjoyable and hassle-free. So, whether you're shopping for clothing, electronics, home goods, or any other product, we hope you'll choose us for all your online shopping needs.
thank: Thank you again for your business, and we look forward to serving you in the future.
howTitle: How to sell on MGD Mall?
sellOne: Thank you for your interest in becoming a seller on mgdmall.com.mm. We're excited to invite you to join our growing community of sellers and showcase your products to our customers. By partnering with us, you'll have the opportunity to reach a wider audience, boost your sales, and grow your business.
sellTwo: We have a thriving community of shoppers who actively search for unique products. By selling your products on our platform, you'll gain access to a wide customer base, allowing you to increase your sales potential.
sellThree: Our user-friendly design and tools make it easy for you to set up your store, manage your inventory, and fulfill orders. We provide comprehensive seller support and resources to ensure your sales are smooth and hassle-free.
sellFour: As a seller on mgdmall.com.mm, your products will be showcased in our marketplace, giving you increased visibility and exposure. Our marketing efforts, including social media promotions and targeted advertising, will help drive traffic to your store. We have robust systems in place to protect against fraud and provide secure payment transactions. So you can sell with confidence.
sellFive: To start selling, you can open an account by contacting us via email, Facebook, or Viber. Once your products are uploaded, you can start receiving orders from customers. Manage your inventory, process orders, and communicate with buyers through our platform. We'll provide you with the necessary tools and resources to help you succeed.
sellSix: Join us now and start your journey as a seller on mgdmall.com.mm. Together, we can create a vibrant and successful online shopping experience for our customers.
sellSev: If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact our seller support team. We're here to help you every step of the way.
